summary: Find Love is the story of two strangers who aren't looking for love but find it anyway. It is a Twenty-Four hour romance ride that truthfully captures that first feeling of falling for someone.
cast: Christian Camargo|Alexie Gilmore|Thunderbird Dinwiddie|David P. Emrich|Cullen Moss|Kristin Foster|Elaine Nalee|Valerie Watkins|Craig Sheffer|Beth W. Crookham|Colin Carhart|Courtney Moody|Sam Robison
title: Find Love
